TitlePage.Title: NoCK
TitlePage.Subtitle: Computing obstruction for compact Clifford-Klein form

TitlePage.Abstract: In this package we develop functions for algorithms of finding homogeneous spaces of semisimple non-compact Lie groups which do not admit compact Clifford-Klein forms.
TitlePage.Acknowledgements: We thank Willem de Graaf for his help in getting some literature sources.
